title: Stuck in reconnect screen

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Queued up for an Aram game, everything was fine until the game was about to begin. Then the counter finished and everyone disconnected and the game didnt load. I restarted client and I'm stuck on this screen and can't reconnect.

replies.body:
I just logged in to post this exact thing. Finished a ranked match, clicked "skip waiting for stats" now I'm stuck on the Game Abandoned screen.

Have logged in/out several times, restarted nothing helped.
BUMP, I just finished a game and It still says I need to reconnect to it ZZ
we want free rp for damages
KEEP LIKING THIS AND BUMPING GUYS
Yup, was stuck in champ select in ranked, closed the client to try and reconnect, reconnect button doesnt work and now am just stuck zZZz
BUMP up same thing has happened to me stuck in a game thats no longer there
Happened twice to me last couple of days, stuck in one right now.

Same thing here, just finished a ranked game, clicked skip results and now I can do anything. Just says "the game has crashed, please try to reconnect to the game" have restarted the client 10+ times with no result.
was able to reconnect to game now ppl should keep trying to connect
rito has seen it there looking at the problem right now :P check top right of ur screens
Same problem - stuck at the reconnect screen.
Was a ranked game for me but same thing happened at end.
